title: What is this modern serif font?
content:
Can anyone tell me what font this is? Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804233240/http:/typophile.com/files/image_71.jpg) | 20.22 KB |
author: junia119

comments.content:
[Monotype Engravers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804233240/http:/www.identifont.com/list?3+Monotype%20Engravers+0+3PG+1+F7Y+1+40W+1+4AD+1+EJV+1+60U+1+61D+1+6CI+1+41X+2+L2E+2+422+2+24M+2+6C9+2+J8Q+2+LYH+2+JO+2+N1K+/), a 1902 design, or one of the similar fonts shown in the link.  
Don
